value.0:
This is the journal of the last lord of the keep's advisor. It seems to be largely intact and mostly boring until near the end. These are a few interesting excerpts:
"My Lord has become more and more obsessed with the idea of controlling an undead army. He has the key I found that will open the planar gate, yet I fear that we are missing something... something very important. I have found some oblique references to another key, but I know not what the other key would do, nor where it lies. I shall have to return to the ruins and see if I can finally discover a way to activate the crystal ball. I am sure the answers must be hidden within it."
The last entry:
"My lord is impatient to open the planar gate. I have begged him to hold off until I am done here, and my efforts have finally paid off. Today I managed to activate the crystal ball! The second key is used for controlling the undead army. Without it, opening the planar gate would be suicide! I can now return and tell my lord exactly where the second key is and how it works. I am sure he will be pleased with... now where did my page run off to? There was a noise in the antechamber, which I sent him to investigate, but he hasn't returned. I guess I shall have to go find him, then return to the keep."
